user.title: Connect to DVSPortal
user.description: Enter your DVSPortal credentials to integrate your parking services.

create_reservation.description: Create a new parking reservation. Either choose a known car or manually enter a license plate.

entity_id.description: Choose a known car sensor entity.
entity_id.name: Known Car

entry_id.description: Choose the DVSPortal registration. Defaults to the only one if applicable.
entry_id.name: DVSPortal Registration

license_plate_value.description: The value of the license plate for the reservation.
license_plate_value.name: License Plate Value

license_plate_name.description: The name associated with the license plate (optional).
license_plate_name.name: License Plate Name

date_from.description: The start date for the reservation (optional).
date_from.name: Start Date

date_until.description: The end date for the reservation (optional).
date_until.name: End Date

end_reservation.description: End an active or future parking reservation.

entity_id.description: Choose a known car sensor entity to end its reservation.
entity_id.name: Known Car
